data.text: It does and Module 3, that's completely different. It's Flip the Script, so we teach how to teach synchronously and asynchronously, so synchronously means everybody at the same time and asynchronously means means people learn at different times, and so the main thing there is we're going to show you how to use Mailchimp to make a newsletter, and you can sent out letters, send out lessons via the newsletter, and you can store things in OneDrive just like you did in Drive. OneDrive is by Microsoft, and then we're going to show you how to make some cool quizzes using Kahoot and Quizziz. Those are two softwares online that make really nice quizzes, and also how to make presentations, slide presentations. So most people know about Powerpoint but we're going to looks at Google Slides and Slideshare and also Prezi, and Slideshare is free, but it's linked with LinkedIn, so we're going to talk about that a little bit as well.
